name: node_server
description: Web Interface for the Digital Logic Simulation Engine

scripts.start:sim: npm run build:sim && npm run dev
scripts.build:sim: npm run clean && echo "[1/2] Configuring..." && (cmake -S ../../Backend/linux_app -B ../../Backend/build -DBUILD_FOR_BEAGLEY=OFF > /dev/null 2>&1) && echo "[2/2] Compiling..." && (cmake --build ../../Backend/build -- -s > /dev/null 2>&1)
scripts.build:beagley: npm run clean && echo "[1/2] Configuring Cross-Compile..." && (cmake -S ../../Backend/linux_app -B ../../Backend/build -DBUILD_FOR_BEAGLEY=ON -DCMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE=$(pwd)/../../Backend/linux_app/aarch64-toolchain.cmake > /dev/null 2>&1) && echo "[2/2] Compiling ARM64..." && (cmake --build ../../Backend/build -- -s > /dev/null 2>&1)

author: Arshia Soleimany
